== Father of the Bomb? == I just removed the claim, added by an anonymous ip, that Segrè has been nicknamed "father of the bomb". This claim is unsupported and, given the work accomplished by Segrè in Los Alamos, totally exaggerated. [[User:Alessandro57|Alex2006]] ([[User talk:Alessandro57|talk]]) 08:27, 30 November 2015 (UTC)
